step.para: Set up git in the command line: $ git config --global user.name "Ken Cortez"
Verify that this is set by qurerying with the same command (without quotes) $ git config --global user.name
Set up email and query email the same way with $ git config --global user.email "kenmcortez@yahoo.com"
Note that I am using my Yahoo email!
Now cd into the project folder and run the command $ git init
This obviously initializes git inside of our project
stage all files in the root dir for addition by entering
Then commit all files with messages "m" applied to all "a" committed
This is just a standard for the initial commit
Type $ git add . but do NOT commit
Type $ git checkout -f which brings back everything
